SummaryEnglish: Seventeen years ago, Takafumi's uncle fell into a coma, but now he's back like a man risen from his grave. Soon, Takafumi discovers two bizarre things: His uncle treasures video games above all else, and, while comatose, he was actually transported to another world as some heroic guardian! Now, not only does Takafumi have to room with an uncle who is literally magical, he also has to catch the guy up on two decades of history—smartphones, high-speed internet, modern anime tropes…and the traumatic outcome of the '90s console war!

1.TitleEnglish: AT-X特番『異世界おじさん』ちゃんねる
1.SummaryEnglish: ＜出演＞ 子安武人（おじさん役） 福山潤(たかふみ役) 詳細情報 ＜番組内容＞ テレビアニメ放送直前！作品の見どころや実際に登場する名作ゲームたちを、おじさん役・子安武人、たかふみ役・福山潤でお届け！

1.TitleEnglish: I'm Finally Back From the Fantasy World of Granbahamal After 17 Long Years!
1.SummaryEnglish: Takafumi’s uncle wakes up from a 17-year coma, claiming he was in another dimension, and he tries to prove it by showing off his magical powers.

2.SummaryEnglish: Takafumi surprises his uncle with an early birthday present. As the new year begins, Takafumi bumps into a childhood friend.

3.SummaryEnglish: While Takafumi and his uncle strategize on how to increase their YouTube subscriber count, Fujimiya is worried about the well-being of her crush.

4.TitleEnglish: You Helped Me Through Tough Times
4.SummaryEnglish: Fujimiya tries to catch Takafumi’s attention. Takafumi’s uncle shares a seemingly romantic memory he experienced during his time in the other dimension.

5.TitleEnglish: That Reminds Me, I Almost Got Assassinated Once
5.SummaryEnglish: Takafumi’s uncle has a flashback to the time he narrowly escaped an assassination attempt — and his story keeps getting grimmer.

6.TitleEnglish: So They Threw Me Into the Basement of a Freak Show...
6.SummaryEnglish: Even Takafumi’s uncle has memories he’d rather forget. But he also remembers a rare heroic moment he experienced in the other dimension.

7.TitleEnglish: As You Can See, SEGA Games Are Very Helpful in Life!
7.SummaryEnglish: Takafumi’s uncle recalls the time he almost made friends in the other dimension. Meanwhile, Fujimiya heads to her college campus to meet someone.

8.TitleEnglish: I Got Through It by Transforming Into the Most Powerful Being I Know
8.SummaryEnglish: Takafumi’s uncle continues his story about his search to find the Shining Crusader, revealing a thoughtful side to him — almost like a real hero.

9.TitleEnglish: The Ice Spirit Demands a Price for Its Cooler Magic
9.SummaryEnglish: Stuck in an apartment without air conditioning in record breaking heat, Takafumi’s uncle negotiates with the Ice Spirits for help.

10.TitleEnglish: Civility Only Comes After You're Seen as a Person
10.SummaryEnglish: Worried that Fujimiya is hanging out with the wrong crowd, her friend from college comes to visit her at Takafumi’s apartment.

11.TitleEnglish: N-no, I Wasn't Looking at Anything Dirty...
11.SummaryEnglish: Unable to wield his powers, Takafumi’s uncle finds himself helpless against magic-sealing birds. Later, he has a heart to heart with Alicia.

12.TitleEnglish: Names Are Important, That's What (He/She) Said
12.SummaryEnglish: Takafumi’s uncle reminisces about the time he was tasked with hunting down a mysterious singing demon. Meanwhile, he longs to find his way home.

13.TitleEnglish: It's Thanks to All of You
13.SummaryEnglish: Up against the legendary venom dragon, Takafumi’s uncle and his cohorts feel hopeless — until Elf comes up with an ingenious plan. Let the battle begin!
